Name: Alexander (cocktail)
Ingredients:
3 cl cognac
3 cl white crème de cacao
3 cl light cream

Name: Americano (cocktail)
Ingredients:
3 cl Campari
3 cl red vermouth
A splash of soda water

Name: Aviation (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4.5 cl gin
1.5 cl lemon juice
1.5 cl maraschino liqueur

Name: Bacardi cocktail
Ingredients:
4.5 cl white rum
2 cl lime juice
1 cl grenadine syrup

Name: Casino (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4 cl gin (Old Tom)
1 cl Maraschino
1 cl orange bitters
1 cl fresh lemon juice

Name: Clover Club Cocktail
Ingredients:
4.5cl Gin
1.5cl Lemon Juice
1.5cl Raspberry Syrup
1 Egg White

Name: Daiquiri
Ingredients:
4.5 cl (9 parts) white rum
2.5 cl (5 parts) lime juice
1.5 cl (3 parts) simple syrup

Name: Martini (cocktail)
Ingredients:
6 cl (6 parts) gin
1 cl (1 parts) dry vermouth

Name: Manhattan (cocktail)
Ingredients:
5 cL rye
2 cL Sweet red vermouth
Dash Angostura bitters

Name: Negroni
Ingredients:
3 cl gin
3 cl sweet red vermouth
3 cl campari

Name: Old Fashioned
Ingredients:
4.5 cL Bourbon or Rye whiskey
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 sugar cube
Few dashes plain water

Name: Paradise (cocktail)
Ingredients:
3.5 cl (7 parts) gin
2 cl (4 parts) apricot brandy
1.5 cl (3 parts) orange juice

Name: Planter's Punch
Ingredients:
4.5cl Dark rum
3.5 cl Fresh orange juice
3.5 cl Fresh pineapple juice
2 cl Fresh lemon juice
1 cl Grenadine syrup
1 cl Sugar syrup
3 or 4 dashes Angostura bitters

Name: Porto flip
Ingredients:
1.5 cl (3 parts) brandy
4 cl (8 parts) port
1 cl (2 parts) egg yolk

Name: Rusty Nail (cocktail)
Ingredients:
7.5 cl Scotch Whisky
2.5 cl Drambuie

Name: Sazerac
Ingredients:
5 cl Cognac
1 cl Absinthe
One sugar cube
Two dashes Peychaud's Bitters

Name: Screwdriver (cocktail)
Ingredients:
5 cL (1 part) vodka
10 cL (2 parts) orange juice

Name: Whiskey sour
Ingredients:
4.5 cl (3 parts) Bourbon whiskey
3 cl (2 parts) fresh lemon juice
1.5 cl (1 part) Gomme syrup
dash egg white (optional)

Name: Bellini (cocktail)
Ingredients:
10 cl (2 parts) Prosecco
5 cl (1 part) fresh peach purée

Name: Black Russian
Ingredients:
5 cl (5 parts) Vodka
2 cl (2 parts) Coffee liqueur

Name: Bloody Mary (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4.5 cl (3 parts) Vodka
9 cl (6 parts) Tomato juice
1.5 cl (1 part) Lemon juice
2 to 3 dashes of Worcestershire Sauce
Tabasco
Celery salt
Pepper

Name: Caipirinha
Ingredients:
5 cl cachaça
Half a lime cut into 4 wedges
2 teaspoons sugar

Name: Cosmopolitan (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4 cl Vodka Citron
1.5 cl Cointreau
1.5 cl Fresh lime juice
3 cl Cranberry juice

Name: Cuba Libre
Ingredients:
12 cL Cola
5 cL Light rum
1 cL Fresh lime juice

Name: Godfather (cocktail)
Ingredients:
3.5cl scotch whisky
3.5cl Disaronno

Name: Golden dream (cocktail)
Ingredients:
2 cl (2 parts) Galliano
2 cl (2 parts) Triple Sec
2 cl (2 parts) Fresh orange juice
1 cl (1 part) Fresh cream

Name: Harvey Wallbanger
Ingredients:
4.5 cL (3 parts) Vodka
1.5 cL (1 part) Galliano
9 cL (6 parts) fresh orange juice

Name: Horse's Neck
Ingredients:
4 cL (1 part) Brandy
12 cL (3 parts) Ginger ale
Dash of Angostura bitter (optional)

Name: Irish coffee
Ingredients:
4 cl (2 parts) Irish whiskey
8 cl (4 parts) hot coffee
3 cl (1½ parts) fresh cream
1tsp brown sugar

Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Ingredients:
1.5 cl Tequila
1.5 cl Vodka
1.5 cl White rum
1.5 cl Triple sec
1.5 cl Gin
2.5 cl Lemon juice
3.0 cl Gomme Syrup
1 dash of Cola

Name: Mai Tai
Ingredients:
4 cl white rum
2 cl dark rum
1.5 cl orange curaçao
1.5 cl Orgeat syrup
1 cl fresh lime juice

Name: Margarita
Ingredients:
3.5 cL (7 parts) tequila
2 cL (4 parts) Cointreau
1.5 cL (3 parts) lime juice

Name: Mimosa (cocktail)
Ingredients:
7.5 cl champagne
7.5 cl orange juice

Name: Mint julep
Ingredients:
6 cL Bourbon whiskey
4 mint leaves
1 teaspoon powdered sugar
2 teaspoons water

Name: Moscow mule
Ingredients:
4.5cl (9 parts) vodka
0.5cl (1 part) lime juice
12cl (24 parts) ginger beer

Name: Piña colada
Ingredients:
3 cl (one part) white rum
3 cl (one part) coconut milk
9 cl (3 parts) pineapple juice

Name: Rose (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4 cl (2 parts) dry vermouth
2 cl (1 parts) Kirsch
3 Dashes Strawberry syrup

Name: Sea Breeze (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4 cl Vodka
12 cl Cranberry juice
3 cl Grapefruit juice

Name: Sex on the Beach
Ingredients:
4 cl Vodka
2 cl Peach schnapps
4 cl Orange juice
4 cl Cranberry juice

Name: Singapore Sling
Ingredients:
3 cl Gin
1.5 cl Cherry Liqueur (cherry brandy)
0.75 cl Cointreau
0.75 cl DOM Bénédictine
1 cl Grenadine
12 cl Pineapple juice
1.5 cl Fresh lime juice
1 dash Angostura bitters

Name: Tequila Sunrise (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4.5 cl (3 parts) Tequila
9 cl (6 parts) Orange juice
1.5 cl (1 part) Grenadine syrup

Name: Bramble (cocktail)
Ingredients:
4 cl gin
1.5 cl lemon juice
1 cl simple syrup
1.5 cl Creme de Mure(blackberry liqueur)

Name: B-52 (cocktail)
Ingredients:
2 cl (1 part) coffee liqueur (Kahlúa)
2 cl (1 part) Irish Cream (Baileys Irish Cream)
2 cl (1 part) Orange Cognac (Grand Marnier)

Name: Dark 'N' Stormy
Ingredients:
6 cl dark rum
10 cl Ginger beer

Name: Martini (cocktail)
Ingredients:
6 cl (6 parts) gin
1 cl (1 parts) dry vermouth

Name: Espresso Martini
Ingredients:
5 cl Vodka
1 cl Kahlua
Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)
1 short strong Espresso

Name: Kamikaze (cocktail)
Ingredients:
3 cl vodka
3 cl triple sec
3 cl lime juice

Name: Pisco sour
Ingredients:
4.5cl Pisco
3cl lemon juice [a]
2cl Simple syrup
1 Egg white[b]

Name: Spritz (alcoholic beverage)
Ingredients:
6cl Prosecco
4cl Aperol
Splash of Soda water

Name: Vesper (cocktail)
Ingredients:
6cl gin
1.5cl vodka
0.75cl Lillet Blonde
